name: Tik Tak
description:
Project realized as a result of the second edition of Sensei Game Jam in Wrocław.

Organization is a no laughing matter. Especially managing your personal time, with deadlines haunting you even in your dreams...

Take control over a young technical university student, fighting his daily battle with his fierce enemy, morning lectures, and help him get up on time!

Use WSAD to move around and left mouse button to shoot the alarm clocks. Your goal is to survive the whole assault without being knocked right back into slumber.

Pixel-art, textures, particles and models: Maciej Biernacki
UE Blueprint scripting and development: Michał Macikowski
Supervising and mentoring as team's Sensei: Krzysztof "Dalton" Pachulski

Background Music: Super Mario All-Stars Underwater Theme
